Have you been following the story of 
@N_T_S
's Glencoe Creel House project?

Volunteers and building crafts specialists, including those from 
@HistEnvScot
, have been re-creating a heather-thatched turf house using traditional skills and materials 
The house that sheds light on 17th century life for massacred MacDonald clan
It is one of the UK's most visited areas and a popular stopping point for tourists travelling to the Scottish Highlands.
